gui.platforms.platformer.button.select.i: Platform Selector; cycles between the available platform type.
gui.platforms.platformer.preview.info: Platform Preview; rendering of the final product.
gui.platforms.platformer.slot.buffer.inf: Output Buffer; used as temporary storage for automation. This must be empty before more can be crafted.
gui.platforms.platformer.slot.craft.info: Craft Output; if materials needed are available click here to craft.
gui.platforms.platformer.slot.decon.info: Deconstruction; platforms can be broken down here. Stack size must be equal or greater to the amount received when crafting.
gui.platforms.platformer.slot.material.i: Material Choice; defines look and material used.
gui.platforms.platformer.slot.storage.in: Storage; used to store materials needed for crafting.
gui.platforms.wrench.edit.apply.info: Apply all changes, and close GUI
info.platforms.wrench.tooltip2:
Platform placement guide shown 
when holding the wrench in offhand 
and holding a platform in main hand
platforms.configuration.can_manually_add:
Enables the manual placement of sand, snow, and gravel via sneak place
Other blocks are supported as long as the extend FallingBlock and use Material.SAND
platforms.configuration.chance_rain_wash:
1 in x chance rain will wash away dust layers
Disabled when set to zero, or when 'isEnvironmentReactive' is disabled
platforms.configuration.chance_sand.tool:
1 in x chance sand will passively accumulate
Disabled when set to zero, or when 'isEnvironmentReactive' is disabled
platforms.configuration.chance_sandstorm:
1 in x chance sand will accumulate during a storm
Disabled when set to zero, or when 'isEnvironmentReactive' is disabled
platforms.configuration.chance_snowstorm:
1 in x chance snow will accumulate while snowing
Disabled when set to zero, or when 'isEnvironmentReactive' is disabled
platforms.configuration.compressed_multi:
Multiplies the craft amount by the given value when a block in a 'storage_blocks' tag
 Note: Final value will be capped at a full stack
platforms.configuration.frame_climb_mode:
Sets Frame climbing behaviour
 NONE: Can not be climbed
 LADDER: Ascend via walking. Descends automatically. Sneak holds position
 SCAFFOLD: Ascend via jumping. Descend via sneaking. Automatically holds position
 HYBRID: Ascend via walking. Descend via sneaking. Automatically holds position
platforms.configuration.is_entity_reacti:
When enabled walking on platforms will disturb the collected snow/sand
Regardless of setting you can still remove layers by right clicking with a shovel
platforms.configuration.is_environment_r: When enabled the amount of snow/sand built up on platforms will change with the weather
Changes what sneak right-clicking on a platform with a wrench will do
 GUI: opens the platform selector GUI
 CYCLE: cycles through the options
 MIXED: uses the GUI if the is more then 5 options
